title: Senior Analyst - Strategy
description:
Department: Corporate Strategy & Analytics

Designation: Senior Analyst

Position Overview

The Senior Analyst will work closely with the senior leadership and cross-functional teams to drive business growth strategies, financial modelling, data-driven insights, and investor communications. The role requires strong analytical, financial, and problem-solving skills to support strategic decision-making and improve business performance.

Key Responsibilities: Strategic Planning & Execution


Conduct financial and strategic analyses, including revenue projections, cost analysis, market benchmarking, and pricing evaluations.
Build and evaluate financial models to assess project feasibility and business impact, driving strategic decision-making.
Coordinate with different business units to advance strategic initiatives while pinpointing opportunities to boost operational efficiency and enhance processes.


Data Analytics


Gather, structure, and maintain data as per evolving business needs.
Analyze company-wide data to generate actionable insights for process improvements, revenue growth, and customer satisfaction.
Support ad-hoc strategic projects by delivering timely, data-driven insights to stakeholders across the organization.


Investor & Business Reporting


Prepare reports, presentations and other materials for investor meetings and industry events.
Maintain and prepare monthly business reports to track company performance.
Prepare presentations and dashboards that clearly communicate findings, insights, and recommendations to senior management.


Market & Competitive Analysis


Conduct comprehensive market research to understand industry trends, customer behavior, and competitive dynamics.
Analyze competitor strategies and performance to identify potential opportunities and risks.


Required Qualifications & Skills: Education & Experience:


Bachelors degree from a Tier-1 college (preferred majors: Economics, Engineering, Business, Statistics, Mathematics).
1-2 years of relevant experience in corporate strategy, management consulting, business analysis, or a related field.


Technical Skills:


Advanced MS Excel skills ability to structure and perform analysis independently.
Proficiency in MS PowerPoint and MS Word to create professional presentations and reports.
Strong grasp of financial concepts and numerical analysis.
Ability to manage large datasets and extract meaningful insights.
Experience in data handling, market research, and business intelligence tools (preferred).


Soft Skills & Competencies:


Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills for cross-functional collaboration.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision.
Detail-oriented, proactive, and highly motivated.
